subject: Science
goals: Understand the basic structure and functions of a cell, including the differences between plant and animal cells.
milestones: Be able to identify and describe the function of key organelles within plant and animal cells.

learning_tasks.task: Read textbook chapter on cell structure.
Watch an educational video on plant and animal cells.

practice_tasks.task: Complete a diagram labeling activity for plant and animal cells.
Take an online quiz to test knowledge of cell organelles.

resources: Biology textbook, YouTube video on cell structure, educational websites such as Khan Academy for quizzes and interactive diagrams.
